title: Ticket #3732: param table missing entries, has superfluous entries
description:
After inspection, there are many entries missing from the param table. These include dynamically generated things like NUM_CPUS and MEMORY, but also a bunch of Startd policy entries like PREEMPT, EVICT, SUSPEND and HOLD.

There are also knobs that don't appear to be in the code, including TOOLS_PROVIDE_OLD_MESSAGES and NETWORK_HORIZON. The unit tests also param, and those params are in the table, including usefully named params like "STRING".
creator: gthain
